    Get your Free Beautiful Cover Website

    Make a big step towards launching your business

    Are you ready to launch your business? If you’re answer is ‘not yet’, this is for you! I’m giving away landing websites for 50 passionate entrepreneurs, perfect for a ‘coming soon’ or a launch date web page.

    I’m so excited to be launching my graphic and web design services this month, that I would love to help fellow passionate entrepreneurs stand out even before they (think) are ready.

    apply for your website

    A landing website will help you look professional and don’t miss any opportunity to start showing people the way to your business.

    'Coming soon' site

    Or, if you have a launch date, add it to the website. While you’re getting everything ready for your business launch, don’t miss the opportunity to share what you do, link your favourite social media page and let them contact you via email.

    Free hosting

    No need to worry about hosting for now. I’m offering 6 months of free hosting while you prepare your full website or online shop.

    Mobile and SEO friendly

    I have created the templates to be fully responsive and adaptable to all devices, including phone and tablets. They are also optimised for search engines, so Google will love them.

    Stress-free, quick and easy customisation

    You can add your own text, image, logo and link to website in a super friendly editing platform. It will take only seconds to get your business online.
